secret = 888

privatekey = 888 * G = P

scriptPubKey_asm: <pubkey> OP_CHECKSIG

TERMINAL
--------------
>>> import coincurve
>>> hex(888)
'0x378'
>>> privkey = bytes.fromhex('0378')
>>> g_point = coincurve.PrivateKey.from_int(1)
>>> g_point.public_key.format().hex()
'0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798'
>>> pubkey = g_point.multiply(privkey)
>>> pubkey.public_key.format().hex()
'03c8edf725b59d9f370870a5dcd5e70b0baea493a5b85cb227c1ef6a8e8cdad8fb'
---------------

TERMINAL
------------
>>> digest = bytes.fromhex('0100000001a6842993cbf1dfcfb111036fed900d5a0a64c45d23746df848dbdf4b3c772aed00000000232103c8edf725b59d9f370870a5dcd5e70b0baea493a5b85cb227c1ef6a8e8cdad8fbacfeffffff01101e000000000000232103c8edf725b59d9f370870a5dcd5e70b0baea493a5b85cb227c1ef6a8e8cdad8fbac0000000001000000')
>>> msg = hashlib.sha256(hashlib.sha256(digest).digest()).digest()
>>> msg.hex()
'9e7ab8c65790f4026b5c1dd1df77d4a0e3b52ca03d8a5c0744634683e702e986'
>>> import coincurve
>>> privkey = coincurve.PrivateKey.from_int(888)
>>> privkey.sign(msg, hasher=None).hex()
'3044022021b5cf674240ed0ac38464cba43313469dd7f270a82d7bf31a0a01e139f55e50022018d90d95e51e9bf1d3798c3d0b9f02bd21e82cf6a8d1da74488af08337dad55f'
------------------
